title: God You’re a Liar - Novel Updates
genre: Adult   Comedy   Fantasy   Josei   Mature   Mystery   Romance   Smut
tags: Dragons   Female Protagonist   Gods   Handsome Male Lead   Magic   Naive Protagonist   Past Plays a Big Role   R-18   Reincarnation
author: Kurata Raku   倉多楽
description:
I headed out of the village alone at midnight. This is to fulfill a certain purpose in front of Oiwa, who contained monsters long ago. However, when I noticed it, I was kidnapped into a strange room and suddenly pushed down. The overwhelmingly beautiful man who lay me down seems to be my partner from my previous life.

This is a story of being surrounded by a beautiful young man and making a fuss.>
